description: Thick-dicked Kurt Houston didn't know what to expect when he inherited the haunted Chateau Tivoli.  Randy Mixer's ghost was said to wreak sexual havoc on the Chateau's guests.  Cook Drew Nolan and bellman Chad Connors experienced the ghost in the kitchen, beginning with moving objects quickly leading to hot cock sucking and relentless butt-fucking on the kitchen table.  Assholes are licked and rimmed.  Big fat cocks join in, pounding ready asses.  The action is so fierce that the heat soon sends both studs over the edge.
title: Possession, Scene #01
